data:
[{'date': '2025-09-09', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I am', 'content': 'I am is the best thing that you have to have because you can read a lot and learn how to read just do a lot so better than I am for now is the best of the greatest of all', 'author': 'D’arrious', 'version': '5.118.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-09', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Used to love, but paywall is disgusting', 'content': 'I used to love this app and I used it every morning with the “practice” feature for 15 mins to help brighten my day in the morning because I would listen to the affirmations being spoken while I would get ready. However, I will no longer be using this app. The practice feature is now behind a paywall that offers a 3-day free trial and then you have to PAY $70 PER YEAR. I’m sorry, but that is just too much for a simple affirmation app. I loved this app so much but now that almost everything is behind a paywall, I am going to stop using this app because the greed of the company is honestly disgusting to me. I hope they learn that they will continuously lose customers because of their greed. They do not care about their customers enjoying the app. All they care about is money.', 'author': 'yovanecall', 'version': '5.118.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-09', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'AU', 'title': 'So good', 'content': 'Wonderfull always keeps me smiling even on the bad days', 'author': 'Jayde@Luv', 'version': '5.118.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-09', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love it but....', 'content': "I love the app, but all of a sudden it won't allow me to save my favorites, hence the 4 star review. Please fix it. 🙏", 'author': 'Sweet_K-os', 'version': '5.118.1'}, {'date': '2025-09-08', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'This app has changed my perspective on everything!!', 'content': 'i love how you can customize the app and the background of the affirmations. i also like being able to just scroll to find new inspiration. i have shared this app with a lot of my friends and family and they too appreciate it very much. i have learned that words are super powerful!! i would totally recommend this app to anyone who overthinks, is going through a rough patch, or has anxiety and or depression. thank you so much whoever made this!', 'author': 'urbestie_BROOKE', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-07', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'A rip off', 'content': 'Ok sure it’s a nice app, but worth nearly $70 a year? Just for affirmations? My fitness tracking apps are nearly half that and do 100x more. I think it’s a cool app but for the price point it’s ridiculous. My bigger issue is that I requested a trial and explicitly requested I be notified before the trial ended so that I could cancel. I was NEVER notified, by email or push notification. So it automatically tried charging me. Yes, I should have kept track of that myself, so I do take some responsibility but if you’re not going to notify people then don’t tell them you are as then I would have made absolutely sure I kept track of it myself. Feels like a con to me.', 'author': 'Emma_schlaef', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love this app', 'content': 'i love this app, it has helped my self confidence', 'author': 'Analise Terry', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'DOWNLOAD NOW!!', 'content': 'this app is awesome my self confidence has boosted', 'author': 'LEAH.S!', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-06', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Helps me Daily', 'content': 'It’s a subtle yet powerful thing to have these reminders daily on my phone. At first it felt monumental, now it’s a constant habit that feels a bit mundane. I’m happy they added the streak update to get me to engage and soak in a bit more milliseconds in this mindset. 🌻', 'author': 'McnessaMae', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-06', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': '😕', 'content': 'I am disappointed that I was not notified that my free trial was up before being charged.', 'author': 'Miss__Priss', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-06', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Something changed', 'content': 'I’m changing my review to one star. I Am has been one of my favorite apps for as long as I’ve had it, but right now I’m so frustrated with it. I bought premium because I wanted to create my own affirmations. I choose the ones I want to focus on and make them my favorites. I then added it to my Apple Watch. Every time I looked at my watch I was reminded of something I wanted to focus on. And if I wanted to cycle through all my favorites, I could just tap on it to get to the rest. Now, when I look at my watch I just see generic affirmations I’m not interested in. When I tap on it I can get to the rest, but I don’t want to have to do that. I’m ready to give up and remove it from my watch.', 'author': 'bsulliv6', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-05', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': '☺️', 'content': 'Je me sens encouragée. Merci!', 'author': 'Clara5888', 'version': '5.118.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-05', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'AU', 'title': 'So gooooooooooooood', 'content': 'I love it it helps a lot and I love how I can choose wallpaper on it. so I think absolutely amazing you don’t even need to have axity for it to work it can also help in many ways love it get think believe it 🤩✨⭐️🌟💫', 'author': 'annie💍', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-04', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I am', 'content': 'This is a very good app to me i encouragers me everyday all the time y’all should get this app', 'author': 'Hshshxuwheur', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-04', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Good morning!', 'content': 'Made me feel like I was coming “back to life”', 'author': 'academyDae', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'AU', 'title': 'I love this app! 🧘🏻‍♀️🤍', 'content': 'I started to download this app in 2023 and it’s been life changing for me mentally and emotionally and physically to! Love the affirmations I get on my Apple Watch and through my phone! Such amazing app! It’s so worth it! 🫶🏼🫶🏼', 'author': 'MsBiancaBabe', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-03', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'The “Premium” description needs to be updated.', 'content': '(If I misunderstood something or this isn’t accurate, please let me know so I can go check again.) 

So, let me preface this by saying I’m aware of this app being labeled as having “in-app purchases”, but there is no way I answer all the questions from start to finish just to be told there basically is no free/basic version. Their description talks about a “premium” version like it’s a separate thing that you can upgrade to to get all the benefits for, but the app itself is the full premium version. You get 3 days of free access to the premium version before you have to subscribe. 

Respectfully, to anyone reading this, no I’m not some entitled individual who thinks they should get everything for free. I wouldn’t be making this if I was told in the description or upon starting the app there would only be 3 days of access before you have to subscribe. I’m not sure if this was done on purpose or if it was by mistake, but I believe you guys have to be more specific so you don’t waste anyone’s time. Especially when it comes to someone’s mental health. 

Anyways, thanks for reading this. I appreciate any feedback about this if you feel it’s needed or if I’m mistaken about something 🙏.', 'author': 'PhoenixVariety', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Great', 'content': 'I’ve genuinely felt better since using this app.', 'author': 'idahoe.potatoe', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-03', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Not worth it', 'content': '$70 is way too much for an app, they give you the shortest trial, and no reminder that you’re about to be charged.', 'author': 'Momma Esh', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'This got me out my funk!', 'content': 'Reading these daily affirmations helped pull me out of depression. Thank you. I recommend it to others all the time!!', 'author': 'Ressababy', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-02', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Scamming on people with poor mental health', 'content': 'This app is literally requiring you to pay a subscription to receive AI generated notifications from it, half of which are not even affirmations… it’s a scam.
There is also no “ad supported version” you can use for free like they keep saying in their responses. You absolutely WILL have to provide them with payment information in order to continue using the app at all.', 'author': 'Wowforgetit', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-01', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'How i feel', 'content': 'It makes me feel good about myself', 'author': 'Crissanna Cross', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-01', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Its a blend', 'content': 'The program help me stay focused on things that during the course of the day that might get lost from all the chaos on this  planet', 'author': 'Masufa', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-01', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'ES', 'title': 'I am', 'content': 'Es la mejor aplicación que he visto hasta ahora probarla la recomiendo muchísimo', 'author': 'AinhoaCarvajal', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-09-01', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'I just want to love myself', 'content': 'You have to pay to even get even a single affirmation. It’s so sad because I was looking forward to using this app.

I know that it says there are in app purchases but I thought it would be like premium affirmations or smth like that. I’m sure it’s a great app, I’ve heard great things about it but I will not be using it until it’s at least usable without having to pay.

Don’t download if you don’t want to pay for it. It’s unfortunate that something so simple as trying to improve your life has turned into something you have to pay for.', 'author': 'Izy_27', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-31', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'I love it 💗', 'content': 'A message/notif always pop up whenever I need it', 'author': 'Isitquietyet', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-30', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'It’s amazing', 'content': 'It’s amazing daily reminders that we forget to remember', 'author': 'igohog', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-30', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I LOVE THIS APP!!! 🤩🌺😍💋🌸🎀', 'content': 'This app has helped me through a lot of tough situations like starting school. And I couldn’t get the prime membership thing but yesterday day it said that I get to use the special membership for 3 days and u laughed and spent my whole morning looking through the affirmations and themes. One thing for the creator of this app can u plz try to make more affirmations and themes free bc not everyone can afford it. But overall if ur thinking about getting this app get it!!! It helps!! 💋🌊💝🌺💖🌸\U0001fa75🎀💘😝', 'author': 'Beach girl 1226!! 🌊💋🌸💘🌺', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-30', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '5 STARS JUST SO ITS AT THE TOP! - YOU HAVE TO PAY DON’T BOTHER!! There’s better apps!', 'content': 'How ridiculous and unbelievable that you now have to pay for this app and can’t even move forward with personalizing the app until you agree to set up a free trial and then pay… I’ve had this app for YEARS. once upon a time it was free. The backgrounds were free it was a fun, interactive and amazing app. But greed and them realizing  that so many struggle with mental health these days want to profit from that. I find it ironic that one of the promos in setting up your account asks if one of struggles is “struggling financially” then a few pages later it asks you to pay 😂
Used to be good, parting ways.
There’s better FREE apps out there. Or go on CHATGPT and ask it to tell you something inspiring all day don’t waste your money on this stupidity 😂', 'author': 'Strawberry_x_3', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-30', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Eu amei', 'content': 'Depois que eu comecei a usar eu mim senti bem melhor.obrigada I am', 'author': 'Basquete…………………………', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-29', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I am', 'content': 'This is making me better', 'author': 'Mana commence', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-29', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'The best', 'content': 'I’ve used it for years. Downloaded while was in a toxic job. Those removers on my phone banner and on my Apple Watch really did a lot for me. I might have swiped them away often but they got through. I still love this app to this day', 'author': 'Anonymous user 678732', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-28', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Why make this a “streak” app?', 'content': 'I love this app, don’t get me wrong. But it’s really annoying that I get literally any other notifications from it besides the affirmations. After about a month or so, the app will send you a notification threatening to stop sending you affirmations if you don’t go into the app and start a “streak”. Like why? The whole point of this app is to get daily notifications. Not to physically open up the app.', 'author': 'abbyymae', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-28', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'It the little things that matter', 'content': 'I don’t think this app has like completely transformed my life or anything but I will say I get the messages and it definitely impacts how I feel in that moment and I think it subconsciously affects my mood as well, I installed the app years ago and I’ll never delete it.', 'author': 'Geeg’s', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-28', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Cesia', 'content': 'Es muy buena gracias a esta aplicación me siento segura de mi misma :3', 'author': 'ArtWorkout is very good', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-28', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '♡', 'content': 'This app helps so much I am young but it helps if your reading reviews to see if the app is good for you it is trust me it made me feel soich better about myself so fast and this game is amazing pls download I recommend it♡♡♡♡☻✩✩', 'author': 'My favorite go to game', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-27', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Affirmation App', 'content': 'Great app very good, does the work for you. But not perfect.', 'author': 'damage1203', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-27', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'On-boarding way too long', 'content': 'Got mad during on-boarding stage so I deleted an app.', 'author': 'Kmaximoff', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Great', 'content': 'Love the app! I love how I’m able to customize the background to my pictures and create my own affirmations as well to add. You’re able to personalize what type of affirmations you want to receive and also my favorite is it keeps count of the days you do your affirmations! I have a 156 day streak so far!!', 'author': 'Luna the centerfold', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I LOVE IT!', 'content': 'Absolutely Loving it!', 'author': 'Mz. MMD A', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-27', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Just be upfront', 'content': 'I hate when apps wait until after you’ve spent 10 minutes setting up your account to tell you it costs money. Just be upfront.', 'author': 'Jzanae🥘', 'version': '5.117.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-26', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Wonderful App', 'content': 'I utilized the app for the free trial and found it to be Phenomenal! I recommend it to all those who need a reminder of how wonderful they really are and how they deserve the best from themselves! 😍👍🏽', 'author': 'Ladyindeed', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-26', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'love it', 'content': 'it’s a really nice app and gives good daily affirmations depending on what you need them for.', 'author': 'acavavavava', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-25', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'GB', 'title': 'Lovely app', 'content': 'Really sweet and helpful. Lots of synchronicities coming through it', 'author': 'Dannafaith', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-25', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Muse', 'content': 'This app is is my daily whisper in my ear , the vote of confidence, the emotional hug and reassurance I can’t live without !', 'author': 'recycledwhite interiors', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-24', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Scamming on people with poor mental health', 'content': 'This app is literally requiring you to pay a subscription to receive AI generated notifications from it, half of which are not even affirmations… it’s a scam.', 'author': 'Wowforgetit', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-24', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'IT WILL STOP WORKING!!!', 'content': 'And never be fixed again!!! I haven’t received ANY affirmations in months. The “support” is AI and a complete joke. This experience has been the exact opposite of positive. Do what’s right, Monkey Taps.', 'author': 'Lunaveda', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'The best affirmation app', 'content': 'Honestly - this app has lifted me up in all the best ways. The widget reminders are my favorite- and honestly? This affirmation app is my go to when I am feeling down.', 'author': 'Lunaluvenigma', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I Am FTW 🫶', 'content': 'This app has truly saved my mental health in so many ways, on so many days. It seems to pop up in just the right moment when I really need that reminder to keep going, and the messages seem to resonate perfectly. ✨A genius app for those who need mental health affirmations. 💛 As someone who has struggled with MH since childhood, I am so grateful for this little app. I tell everybody about it! A giant thanks + kudos to the developers!🫶✨ Side note: as a Mama of a 5yo + 3yo, and also a 2nd grade teacher…I’d love to see one specifically for kids. Building healthy self talk young and confidence is soo important! 💕', 'author': 'vtgirl11', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'So helpful!!', 'content': 'I am so grateful for this app! I started using it, begrudgingly, at the invitation of a friend who was already using it and finding it very helpful in her life. I was an affirmations naysayer, but have become a convert 😆 One thing that I would love to see is the addition of parenting affirmations. I’m a single mom and it’s hard out here for us! Gentle reminders to give ourselves grace would be so wonderful.', 'author': 'iLoveTheRadio', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I love it', 'content': 'It’s always a right on time type of word', 'author': 'queenqua29', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love this app', 'content': 'I’ve had this app for a few years and I just love it. I’ve been in recovery from burn out and this (among other things) really helped!! And I keep it because it keeps me on the right track. 
I highly recommend to all.', 'author': 'Ama Zarate', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Quality app', 'content': 'There’s lots of apps out there we tell you what this is the real deal. This app is a brain changer game changer.  I’m so thankful it’s here. I love this app. It’s helped me so much. Thank you I am.', 'author': 'str8ner11', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Absolutely… duh.. just buy it', 'content': 'I only pay for two apps: My period tracking app and my affirmations app because they are equally as important to me. This app will alter your brain in the most beautiful way. Thank you. Grateful for this app really. It’s helped a lot with my depression, anxiety and self-esteem issues', 'author': 'Christinakilamb', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-21', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'ES', 'title': 'Decepcionante', 'content': 'No te permite entrar si no es suscribiendote. Que aunque sea gratis por 3 dias. No tiene versión freemium. Me ha decepcionado, la verdad', 'author': 'olaokita', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-21', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'So good!', 'content': 'I wish I could like the affirmation w/o the app trying to open but this is a great way to keep your mind positive. I’ve had three friends and my daughter add it - it’s SO much easier to remember to do your affirmations if they are on your Lock Screen. Love it!', 'author': 'Alli29999', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-21', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Widget broken AGAIN', 'content': 'I love this app and love the custom widgets to match my aesthetic. HOWEVER… with every update the widget stops working properly so now it’s the generic widget not personalized and isn’t the theme I chose. It also notifies me of streaks I don’t actually have all the time. I pay for this app and it’s constantly getting screwy.', 'author': 'Cesca825', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-21', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Paid for app', 'content': 'You have to pay for this. I thought it was free.', 'author': 'ShaeJniece', 'version': '5.116.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-20', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Nice', 'content': 'The app is nice but 70 for a whole year may not be feasible for everyone. There should be a monthly option.', 'author': 'Googlybear0', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-20', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Daily Affirmations', 'content': 'Keeping me positive throughout my day so much to be Thankful And 
Grateful For 
🙏✨❤️🌎🙏', 'author': 'Odeano55', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-18', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Hi', 'content': 'It really helps mentaly and physically', 'author': 'samcool124', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-18', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Ads', 'content': 'Ads', 'author': 'rah04258', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-18', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '☆star', 'content': 'البرنامج مليان ايجابيههههه🤍🤍', 'author': 'قطه', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-17', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Meh', 'content': 'Pensé que era una aplicación gratis, son solo mensajes, al menos ofrecer comprar dentro de la app pero te hacen un cuestionario de mil horas al empezar para después decirte que tienes 3 días gratis y que tienes que pagar ahí mismo', 'author': 'GDVRUIZ', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-17', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Thank you', 'content': 'I am really made my mental health better by telling me I mattered every day and other compliments!!', 'author': 'Charcharcharlie8', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-16', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'AU', 'title': 'this app rocks yo', 'content': 'some would think having an app like this is silly, but it’s nice to suddenly get a notification saying I rock or something. I secretly install the app on my friend’s and family’s phones lol 🫵🫰', 'author': 'sarahorsara', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-15', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'not free', 'content': 'i love the idea and concept of this app, but the fact that you have to pay is dumb. you shouldn’t have to pay for affirmations when you’re mentally unwell.', 'author': 'belluga_bell', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-14', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '🛡️❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥\U0001fabd', 'content': '💋', 'author': 'BioWare’s', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-13', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Can’t go wrong', 'content': 'Self care is so important and this app is a great place to start', 'author': 'Mell0wdy', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-13', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Ezmerelda Talakai Touchet', 'content': 'Bestie in app form', 'author': 'Aaaplie', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-13', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing', 'content': 'This app makes me feel so much better about my self and all the messages just brightens my day', 'author': '-bevy', 'version': '5.114.0'}]
